welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Markt Indersdorf, Germany! Known for its beautiful scenery and rich history, we invite you to explore our city and soak in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fuerstenfeldbruck Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Fuerstenfeldbruck Airport, primarily serving regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Franz Josef Strauss Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at the airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, with a 24-hour limit per device.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oberpfaffenhofen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and chartered flights at Oberpfaffenhofen Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Augsburg - Muehlhausen Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Augsburg - Muehlhausen Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
